verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Sanctify<WH6942> to me all<WH3605> the firstborn,<WH1060> whatever<WH3605> opens<WH6363> the womb<WH7358> among the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> both of man<WH120> and of beast:<WH929> it is mine.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> Remember<WH2142> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> in which<WH834> you came<WH3318> out from Egypt,<WH4714> out of the house<WH1004> of bondage;<WH5650> for by strength<WH2392> of hand<WH3027> the LORD<WH3068> brought<WH3318> you out from this<WH2088> place: there shall no<WH3808> leavened<WH2557> bread be eaten.<WH398>
This day<WH3117> came<WH3318> you out in the month<WH2320> Abib.<WH24>

And it shall be when<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> shall bring<WH935> you into<WH413> the land<WH776> of the Canaanites,<WH3669> and the Hittites,<WH2850> and the Amorites,<WH567> and the Hivites,<WH2340> and the Jebusites,<WH2983> which<WH834> he swore<WH7650> to your fathers<WH1> to give<WH5414> you, a land<WH776> flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> that you shall keep<WH5647> this<WH2088> service<WH5656> in this<WH2088> month.<WH2320>
Seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> you shall eat<WH398> unleavened<WH4682> bread, and in the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> shall be a feast<WH2282> to the LORD.<WH3068>

Unleavened<WH4682> bread shall be eaten<WH398> seven<WH7651> days;<WH3117> and there shall no<WH3808> leavened<WH2557> bread be seen<WH7200> with you, neither<WH3808> shall there be leaven<WH7603> seen<WH7200> with you in all<WH3605> your quarters.<WH1366>

And you shall show<WH5046> your son<WH1121> in that day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559> This is done because<WH5668> of that which the LORD<WH3068> did<WH6213> to me when I came<WH3318> forth<WH3318> out of Egypt.<WH4714>

And it shall be for a sign<WH226> to you on your hand,<WH3027> and for a memorial<WH2146> between<WH996> your eyes,<WH5869> that the LORD's<WH3068> law<WH8451> may be in your mouth:<WH6310> for with a strong<WH2389> hand<WH3027> has the LORD<WH3068> brought<WH3318> you out of Egypt.<WH4714>
You shall therefore keep<WH8104> this<WH2063> ordinance<WH2708> in his season<WH4150> from year<WH3117> to year.<WH3117>

And it shall be when<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> shall bring<WH935> you into<WH413> the land<WH776> of the Canaanites,<WH3669> as he swore<WH7650> to you and to your fathers,<WH1> and shall give<WH5414> it you,

That you shall set apart<WH5674> to the LORD<WH3068> all<WH3605> that opens<WH6363> the matrix,<WH7358> and every<WH3605> firstling<WH6363> that comes<WH7698> of a beast<WH929> which<WH834> you have;<WH1961> the males<WH2145> shall be the LORD's.<WH3068>

And every<WH3605> firstling<WH6363> of an ass<WH2543> you shall redeem<WH6299> with a lamb;<WH7716> and if<WH518> you will not redeem<WH6299> it, then you shall break<WH6202> his neck:<WH6203> and all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> of man<WH120> among your children<WH1121> shall you redeem.<WH6299>

And it shall be when<WH3588> your son<WH1121> asks<WH7592> you in time<WH4279> to come,<WH4279> saying,<WH559> What<WH4100> is this?<WH2063> that you shall say<WH559> to him, By strength<WH2392> of hand<WH3027> the LORD<WH3068> brought<WH3318> us out from Egypt,<WH4714> from the house<WH1004> of bondage:<WH5650>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when<WH3588> Pharaoh<WH6547> would hardly<WH7185> let us go,<WH7971> that the LORD<WH3068> slew<WH2026> all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> in the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> both the firstborn<WH1060> of man,<WH120> and the firstborn<WH1060> of beast:<WH929> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I sacrifice<WH2076> to the LORD<WH3068> all<WH3605> that opens<WH6363> the matrix,<WH7358> being males;<WH2145> but all<WH3605> the firstborn<WH1060> of my children<WH1121> I redeem.<WH6299>

And it shall be for a token<WH226> on your hand,<WH3027> and for frontlets<WH2903> between<WH996> your eyes:<WH5869> for by strength<WH2392> of hand<WH3027> the LORD<WH3068> brought<WH3318> us forth<WH3318> out of Egypt.<WH4714>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when Pharaoh<WH6547> had let the people<WH5971> go,<WH7971> that God<WH430> led<WH5148> them not through the way<WH1870> of the land<WH776> of the Philistines,<WH6430> although<WH3588> that was near;<WH7138> for God<WH430> said,<WH559> Lest<WH6435> peradventure the people<WH5971> repent<WH5162> when they see<WH7200> war,<WH4421> and they return<WH7725> to Egypt:<WH4714>

But God<WH430> led<WH5437> the people<WH5971> about,<WH5437> through the way<WH1870> of the wilderness<WH4057> of the Red<WH5488> sea:<WH3220> and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went<WH5927> up harnessed<WH2571> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>

And Moses<WH4872> took<WH3947> the bones<WH6106> of Joseph<WH3130> with him: for he had straightly sworn<WH7650> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> God<WH430> will surely visit<WH6485> you; and you shall carry<WH5927> up my bones<WH6106> away hence<WH2088> with you.
And they took their journey<WH5265> from Succoth,<WH5523> and encamped<WH2583> in Etham,<WH864> in the edge<WH7097> of the wilderness.<WH4057>

And the LORD<WH3068> went<WH1980> before<WH6440> them by day<WH3119> in a pillar<WH5982> of a cloud,<WH6051> to lead<WH5148> them the way;<WH1870> and by night<WH3915> in a pillar<WH5982> of fire,<WH784> to give them light;<WH216> to go<WH3212> by day<WH3119> and night:<WH3915>
He took<WH4185> not away the pillar<WH5982> of the cloud<WH6051> by day,<WH3119> nor the pillar<WH5982> of fire<WH784> by night,<WH3915> from before<WH6440> the people.<WH5971>
